storyInfo: Severin wanted to kill the Infected, but was interrupted by the return of Folinic and the others. Just when they thought they could breathe a sigh of relief, the enemy destroys the town's power generator. The town's movement is greatly affected, and the threat of a Catastrophe is imminent.

attributes.content: I can see the Rathaus spire from here! Thank goodness, it looks like everyone's safe!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Lisa, hurry!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Wh-what happened? Is there a fire?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: My sons haven't come back. Has anyone seen them?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Where are the Gendarmerie?! Where is Severin?! Isn't he supposed to be a hero? And he's missing at a time like this?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Everyone's panicking!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But it looks like they haven't attacked the residential areas. Someone must be leading them!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Everyone's been on edge for far too long. That explosion was all they needed to snap—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Over here! We have to make sure the Rathaus is secure!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Look! There's a lot of them! Hurry!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Hah?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Not bad for a man your age. Must be nice to live without the constant torment of Oripathy, huh?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Sure... If I gave up smoking in my younger days, you and your friends would be sharing a jail cell by now.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Get out of here. Out of respect for you as my fellow townsfolk, I won't—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hah! Look at the mouth on this one! You think we don't know you're the last cop in Wolumonde?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Severin! The jig is up. Let us into the Rathaus so we can run our town already.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: What do you plan to do?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hah?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Settle down. Truce. I'm going to smoke a cigarette while you tell me what exactly you want from this town. Go ahead.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Maybe Wolumonde can consider your demands.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What are you trying to pull?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Look, I'm putting down my sword. I think we can come to terms here. No need to fight.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hah. Now you decide to be reasonable?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Hand over the murderer. And abandon your prejudices.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: ...I want to go home. And I want my job back. Simple enough?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: I just need you to fill out a report, and submit to regular physicals. Simple enough.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: That's it?! You walled us in and left us to die!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: All that's left of my block is a heap of earthquake rubble. It's all Originium clusters that could blow at any moment. You evacuated all the non-infected and we're running out of supplies. Is anyone coming to help us?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Oh right, I almost forgot. Because you suck at your job, Wolumonde is heading straight to hell, and we're just the first ones to be thrown under the bus.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: You still think you're so bright, hiding the truth to 'maintain order?'
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Looks like my matches got wet. I guess I don't have a light. Let's get back to it.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Wha?! Hand-to-hand?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Sure. Just a quick whiff of tobacco is enough to pump me up.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But, I'm sorry to say, we may be about to have an 'accident' here.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Damn it, let go! Are... Are you trying to kill me? Gah—!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: No, just a 'slip' of the hand—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Schultz!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Finished. There were only a few of them, and the rest ran off, leaving this poor fella alone.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Did you kill him?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I don't think so.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It would be nice if the good doctors could wake him up.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: He's breathing!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Let's make sure we're saving lives now.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'll have words for you soon, 'Schultz.'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Sure. I'm all ears, Miss.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Sir...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I told you before, I'm not 'Sir.' I'm not your Schultz when we're alone. I'm Thor's father, and your uncle.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No, Sir, you just... you were going to kill that Infected man.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I won't deny it.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: That's only going to make things worse! And you can't attack a member of the Wolumonde family so lightly!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Even if he told the militants that we're defenseless?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You know what this means, Tatjana.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You should have a heart, at least—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Can't always make the right choice, no matter how much you might want to. Not unless you're omniscient.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Objectively speaking, if a prophet or a banker baron told me just a few deaths would bring peace back to Wolumonde...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I'd do it. No matter who had to die.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...Even if...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: No. Matter. Who.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...At least he managed to hold on to his life. That's good enough.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Let's get back to Rhodes Island. Did you tell them the truth? Did you already take them to the camp? That girl had a different look in her eye.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You already knew...?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I was pretty sure. For what it's worth, I never saw the point in hiding it from them. But keeping it under wraps myself calmed a lot of people down.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What's your read on them?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I think they'll help Wolumonde. They're the same kind of people as Dr. Atro.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*, *hack*. And you think they speak for all of Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They're the ones they sent. So I guess they should be decently representative?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Truth be told, if every Rhodes Island operator we ran into turned out to be a good person, that would disturb me a lot more.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I'm thinking back... to a certain sniper. She was from Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The one who came with Dr. Atro and left shortly thereafter?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I hope she didn't get swallowed up by the Catastrophe...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Wh-what? Another attack?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: At this point, every bandit for miles must know we have no Gendarmerie here.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: So what can we do? Get down on our knees and beg for mercy? Or fight to the bitter end?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No, those explosions are coming from... underground?!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Severin! They're over at the workshops! They came through a tunnel on the next street over!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: They crippled the main power plant!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Look at it. A beautiful, empty town.
Wolumonde. Moon of the Winterwisp Mountains. Yes, truly worthy of its name.
A moon? Pfah!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Four of our people died in that fire.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: And they have the gall to try to pin it on the Infected? What's next? Where do they go from here?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Do they just expect us to turn the other cheek?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: You're quite worked up. Try to relax. You don't usually talk like that.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We should level this place! Damned Wolumonders! Damned immigrants!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Mudrock! You and your Sarkaz could do it!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You're right... Who knows the pain of losing one's home better than the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Even in Leithania, where the Infected are supposed to be able to do what they can with what they have, there is no place for the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: ...But, the cupcakes that nice granny gave us were delicious. Just the right amount of sweet.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: So... We wait. The only thing we're here to destroy is the murderer. We can't lose control of our hate. Or else...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What separates us from what we were before?
attributes.name: Mudrock
